DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, randomized, control, open label study in which up to 50 subjects with metatarsus adductus (MTA) will be enrolled. Subjects will be treated with the standard casting or using the UNFO-s device for total time of 20 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of the Universal Neonatal Foot Orthosis in the Treatment of Metatarsus Adductus (MTA)
DOC.criteria: Subjects with an acute MTA that did not receive any treatment for this condition Consenting parents Ages 14 months Participation in another clinical trial. Neuromuscular disorders Any condition which in the opinion of the investigator renders the subject ineligible for study participation.
DOC.keyword: Metatarsus Adductus, also known as Metatarsus Varus
